AttachmentDTO Data Type

Represents an attachment (either a task or incident attachment).

Properties
name data type description
id number The ID of the attachment.
name string The name of the attachment.
content_type string The content type (MIME type) of the attachment (e.g. "application/pdf").
created number The date the attachment was created.
creator_id ObjectHandle The attachment creator.
size number The size of the attachment (in bytes).
vers number The version of the incident. This is populated even for task attachments (in that case it is the version of the task's incident).
actions array of ActionInfoDTO The list of actions available to the caller for execution.
inc_id number For incident attachments, the incident that this attachment belongs. For task attachments, the incident owning the task that this attachment belongs.
inc_name string For incident attachments, the name of the incident that this attachment belongs. For task attachments, the name of the incident owning the task that this attachment belongs.
inc_owner ObjectHandle For incident attachments, the owner of the incident that this attachment belongs. For task attachments, the owner of the incident owning the task that this attachment belongs.
task_id number For task attachments, the id of the task that this attachment belongs. Null for incident attachments.
task_name string For task attachments, the name of the task that this attachment belongs. Null for incident attachments.
type AttachmentType The type of the attachment (incident, task, or artifact).

Example

{
  "id" : 12345,
  "name" : "...",
  "content_type" : "...",
  "created" : 12345,
  "creator_id" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "size" : 12345,
  "vers" : 12345,
  "actions" : [ {
    "id" : 12345,
    "name" : "...",
    "enabled" : true
  }, {
    "id" : 12345,
    "name" : "...",
    "enabled" : true
  } ],
  "inc_id" : 12345,
  "inc_name" : "...",
  "inc_owner" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "task_id" : 12345,
  "task_name" : "...",
  "type" : "incident"
}
